settings.title: Hyaluronic Acid
settings.text: Multi-molecular Hyaluronic Acid ensures deep hydration and helps reinforce the skin barrier

settings.title: Mineral UV Filters
settings.text: Formulated with Zinc Oxide, the holy grail of natural and sustainable sun protection

settings.title: Extract of Northern Blueberry
settings.text: Rich in natural antioxidants, protects against oxidative stress and signs of environmental ageing

settings.title: Vitamins C+E
settings.text: Soften, smooth, counteract the negative effects of solar radiation

settings.title: Clinically Proven to*:
settings.text:
Reduce the effects of stress on skin

Firm skin in 2 weeks

Visibly reduce dark circles by 80% in 4 weeks

settings.title: Immediately after 1 use**:
settings.text:
97 %

*Based on a third-party clinical study conducted over 4 weeks on 29 women ages 33-60.

**Based on a third-party consumer perception study conducted over 4 weeks on 30 women ages 33-60.

settings.heading: Scienced-backed ingredients
settings.text:
Plastic-free makeup infused with skincare benefits including phytoglycogen and collagen to nourish skin and create a radiant complexion. EWG VERIFIED™, made with 99%+ natural origin ingredients* that are 100% vegan and cruelty free.

Committed to never use titanium dioxide (TiO2) as well as carmine – this is how we revolutionize the beauty industry to deliver the best for the body and the planet.
*Except for highlighter

settings.heading: Eco-innovative packaging
settings.text: Solid makeup in a plastic-free packaging made of FSC-certified biodegradable cardboard from responsibly managed forests to reduce plastic waste. For every product purchased, we plant a tree to reduce our carbon footprint and help preserve the planet's ecosystems.
